daily.finish: Well done! This is all, you can continue with your work üí™
daily.wantDaily: Hey! Are you ready to have our daily meeting now?
daily.later: Ok, you can start your daily later by typing *`daily`*.
daily.fail: I'm having an issue when saving your daily follow-up in memory, can you please try again later by typing `daily`?
daily.failTemplate: I'm having an issue when saving your daily follow-up in memory, it seems that you have changed the template of the followup, can you please try again by typing `daily`?
daily.dailyExists: Your daily report is already completed, please type *report* to see your last update or type *`daily reset`* to delete your Today's daily.
daily.resetDailyNoAction:
You haven't finished your Today's daily yet.
Type *`daily`* in a direct message to me to start your daily follow-up, or wait until your next daily, I will remind you.
daily.resetDailySuccess:
Ok, I deleted your daily report.
You can start again your Daily report by typing *`daily`* üôÇ
daily.resetDailyFail: I'm having trouble deleting your report, it might be temporary. Sorry and please try asking me later for this.
daily.resetDailyChannelInfo:
I can help you! However it should be via direct message.
Please type *`daily reset`* in a DM to me.
daily.motDay: At the end of this daily follow-up, I'll ask you an additional question about motivation üòâ
daily.noDaily:
Hey! I just shared the daily report with the team, but you didn't complete yours üòû - please let your team know what you're working on.
You can still fill it in, just type *`daily`* and let's do it üôÇ
daily.halfDaily: Heads up! I just shared the team report but you didn't finish yours, you can still fill it in üòâ
daily.channelInfo:
I can surely help with this via direct message.
Type me *`daily`* as DM to start your daily update.

pull.admin:
Hey! I‚Äôm sorry I can't help you with this for now.

Your team has reached the monthly limit of 100 follow-up reports.

Please [upgrade your plan]({{{url}}}) to remove these limits or wait until the next month for me to continue working with your team again, meanwhile, all your team can see previous reports at the dashboard.
pull.member:
Hey! I‚Äôm sorry I can't help you with this for now.

Your team has reached the Free reports limit, please ask your admin to [upgrade](https://www.dailybot.co/pricing/) or wait until the next month for the free limit to be reset.

push.admin:
Hi! Excuse me for bothering you.

Your team just reached the monthly limit of 100 follow-up reports.
If you want me to keep doing follow-ups with your team, please [upgrade your plan]({{{url}}}) or wait until the next month for the free limit to be reset.
push.member:
Hi! Excuse me for bothering you.

Your team just reached the Free reports limit so I won't be doing follow-ups with you until the next month. In order to solve it, please ask your admin to [upgrade the plan](https://www.dailybot.co/pricing/).

daily.snoozed: Ok, your daily has been snoozed for {{timeValue}} minutes.

choices.starterOneOption: Do you want to delete your today's response related to *{{{followupName}}}*?
choices.starterOneOptionJoinResponses: Do you want to delete your responses of your today's Follow-Ups? _Those are: *{{{followupsNames}}}*_
choices.starterMultipleOptions: These are your today's responses to Follow-Ups: _(please type the number of the Follow-Up to reset or type *cancel* to stop this process)_.
choices.notNumber: Please type a number between 1 and {{totalRespondedFollowups}} or type *cancel* to stop the process. _Check the number at the beginning of each responded Follow-Up_.

resetFollowups.notCompleted:
You haven't responded to any Follow-Ups today.
Please type *`daily`* to start your daily Follow-Ups.
resetFollowups.followupRemoved:
Ok, I deleted your response to the Follow-Up *{{{followupName}}}*.
Please type *`daily`* to start over with your daily update.
resetFollowups.followupRemovedJoinResponses:
Ok, I deleted your latest responses for these Follow-Ups: *{{{followupsNames}}}*.
Please type *`daily`* to start over with your daily update.
resetFollowups.noActionPerformed: Ok, I didn't delete any response.

choices.starterMultipleOptions: These are your Follow-Ups for today, _please type the Follow-Up number to start with or type *cancel* to stop this process_:
choices.nextFollowup: Let's continue with the pending Follow-Ups, _please type the Follow-Up number to continue or type *cancel* to stop_:
choices.nextFinalFollowup: Would you like to complete our final Follow-Up? This is *{{{followupName}}}*.
choices.nextFinalFollowupJoinResponses: Would you like to complete your response for our final Follow-Ups? These are: *{{{followupsNames}}}*.
choices.notNumber: Please type a number between 1 and {{totalPendingFollowups}} or type *cancel* to stop this process. _Check the number at the beginning of each Follow-Up_.
choices.wantDailyOneChoice: Hey! Are you ready to have our *{{{followupName}}}* daily meeting now?

followups.startFollowup: Nice, this is your update for *{{{followupName}}}*.
followups.startFollowupAnonymous: > *_Important: your response to this report will be anonymous._*
followups.startFollowupJoinResponses: Nice, this update is for these Follow-Ups: *{{{followupsNames}}}*.
followups.followupFinished: Well done! Your update for *{{{followupName}}}* was completed.
followups.followupFinishedJoinResponses: Well done! Your update was completed for these Follow-Ups: *{{{followupsNames}}}*.
followups.allFollowupsFinished: Well done! This is all, you can continue with your work üí™
followups.cancel: Ok, you cancelled your daily update. Once you're ready, please type *`daily`* to start with your daily update.

report.oneByOne: I just got a new daily report by *{{{name}}}*. Check it out:

slack.shareChannelExternalBotInteraction: Sorry, I can only reply to user messages from the shared external organization. But you can also install me in your workspace [following this link]({{{url}}}) üòä

intro.text:
Hey! Nice to meet you.

I‚Äôm DailyBot and I can help you automate daily updates, stand-up meetings, check-ins, retrospectives and track your team motivation. [Learn more]({{{urlLanding}}}) or visit our [support center]({{{urlSupport}}}) if you need help.

Let‚Äôs set up your account, it‚Äôs easy.

extraAdminIntro.hangouts: Before continuing, I recommend adding me (@DailyBot) to one of your rooms, here in Hangouts Chat. If you already did it, you can skip this step.
extraAdminIntro.msteams: Please add me (@DailyBot) to one of your teams, here in Microsoft Teams. If you already did it, you can skip this step.

pairingFinished.intro: Hey! Well done! I can help you automate daily updates, stand-up meetings, check-ins, retrospectives and track your team motivation.

guestUserShouldAddedFirst.slack: Hi! You're not member of DailyBot yet, please ask an administrator to add you to a team, after that, we'll be able to start working together üòÑ

firstTimeAdded.directMessageFromChannelTrigger: Hey! Thanks for adding me to your team, I‚Äôm really honored. Please use the following link to set me up:

channel.intro: *Hi! Nice to meet you all*, I‚Äôm thrilled to be here ‚Äî I‚Äôm DailyBot and I can help you automate daily updates, stand-up meetings, check-ins, retrospectives, and track team motivation. [Learn more]({{{urlLanding}}}) or visit our [support center]({{{urlSupport}}}) if you need help.

setup.hangouts:
*{{{userName}}}* just became an administrator and we need to complete the account setup.

[user], please send me a *private message* to set up your account.
setup.msteams: We need to complete the account setup, *{{{userName}}}* just became an administrator and I‚Äôm sending you a private message with simple instructions to complete the configuration.

channelMessage.organizationAlreadyExist:
Hey! Nice to meet you.
I‚Äôm DailyBot and I can help you automate daily updates, stand-up meetings, check-ins, retrospectives and track your team motivation. [Learn more]({{{urlLanding}}}) or visit our [support center]({{{urlSupport}}}) if you need help.
Please send me a *private message* to set up your account, it‚Äôs easy.

FeedbackBuilder.info: Hey *[user]*, it'd be great to receive feedback from you. If it's something important, I recommend you to visit our support center.

FeedbackStarter.info: Nice, I love feedback. Please write a comment and I'll make sure that my team reviews it. I'll wait up to 10 minutes for that message, or type *`cancel`* to stop this process.

FeedbackSender.thanks: Got it! Thanks for sharing your feedback.
FeedbackSender.noMessage: You can send feedback about myself to the team behind me. Just type *`feedback`* _followed by your message_. Example: `feedback this bot is awesome and handsome üòç`
FeedbackSender.fail: Sorry, it seems I forgot what we were talking about. Please type *`feedback` _your_message_* to send your feedback.
FeedbackSender.empty: The feedback message should not be empty, write your feedback and try to send it again.
FeedbackSender.cancel: I'll be waiting for your feedback till a next opportunity.

Help.text: Hey, your wish is my command, and these are my available commands:

tips.1: In a direct message just send me the command, in channels you should tag me with *`@dailybot`* before the command.
tips.2: Need extra help? Check out [our FAQs page]({{{url}}}) for more info.

commands.daily: Type *`daily`* in a direct message to start your daily update.
commands.dailyStatus: Type *`daily status`* in a direct message to get the status about your daily updates.
commands.dailyReset: Type *`daily reset`* to remove your today's report.

report.slack: Type *`report`* or *`report @user`* to see a full daily report, or someone else's report.
report.hangouts: Type *`report`* or *`report @user`* to see a full daily report, or someone else's report.
report.msteams: Type *`report`* to see a full daily report.

commands.dashboard: Type *`dashboard`* to see all your team reports, history, settings and more.
commands.settings: Type *`settings`* to get a quick overview of your organization, teams and profile settings.
commands.chicken: Type *`chicken`* to launch a digital Rubber Chicken for any meeting.
commands.feedback: Type *`feedback`* to send me your comments or suggestions.
commands.news: Type *`news`* to read about announcements, new features and changes.
commands.disable: Type *`disable`* to disconnect me. I won't be able to send you more messages. You can re-enable me later by sending me a message.
commands.kudos: Type *`kudos`* or *`++`* *@user1* *@user2* _message_, to give kudos to the user mentioned, the message is optional.
commands.kudosStatus: Type *`kudos status`* in a direct message to see your kudos status.
commands.commands: Type *`commands`* to see all extra available commands.
commands.time: Type *`time`* *@user1* *@user2* to see the time for mentioned user.
commands.timezone: Type *`timezone`* *timezoneName* to know the time in specific timezones.
commands.textformat: Type *`textformat`* to see all available text formats for current platform.

core.Hello:
Hey [user]! Have a great day and remember I'm so happy about being your friend.
Type *`help`* to learn more about me.
core.Dashboard: Ok, please *[follow this link]({{{url}}})* to access the web dashboard.

News.blog: Take a look at *[my blog](https://www.dailybot.co/blog/)* to read about tips, key learnings and other content that our team is sharing.
News.changelog: Read my *[release notes](https://www.dailybot.co/blog/release-notes/)* to stay in the loop about new features and improvements.

Datetime.info: The time information for your user is:
Datetime.infoMentionedUsers: The time information for mentioned user is:
Datetime.infoMentionedUsersMultiple: The time information for mentioned users is:
Datetime.infoNotFound: The mentioned user is not an active member of DailyBot organization.
Datetime.infoNotFoundMultiple: The mentioned users are not active members of DailyBot organization.
Datetime.infoMissing: *Note:* _If the time information of any mentioned user does not appear, it is because he is not an active member of DailyBot organization._

core.CommandUpdated: This command has been changed, please type *`help`* to see all current commands.
core.Chicken:
Here comes Arthur!

*[Launch Rubber Chicken]({{{url}}})* üêî

_Pro tip: you can change the last part of Arthur's URL in your browser in order to create a unique room._

Feedback.noMessage: You can send feedback about myself to the team behind me. Just type *`feedback`* _followed by your message_. Example: `feedback this bot is awesome and handsome üòç`
Feedback.fail: Sorry, it seems I forgot what we were talking about. Please type *`feedback` _your_message_* to send your feedback.

core.DisableBotAction:
Ok, it's done. You have disconnected and disabled all private messaging between you and me.
You can still use the [web application]({{{url}}}).

If you want to talk to me again, just type *`enable`*.

EnableBotAction.enable:
Hey! Welcome back, I'm ready to help you.
You can *[login into the web application]({{{url}}})* to check your settings.
EnableBotAction.previouslyEnabled:
It seems that you had enabled me previously, I'm ready to help you.
Please type *`help`* to know more about how I can help you.

core.InactiveBot:
Hey! I'm sorry I can't help you right away as I'm disabled/disconnected.
Please type *`enable`* to re-connect me again.

BTW, you can use my [web application]({{{url}}}) even if I'm disconnected.

InactiveUser.isInactive: Hey! Sorry for this, your DailyBot account for {{platform}} has been deactivated. Please contact an administrator if you want to enable it.
InactiveUser.isUnapproved: Hey! Sorry for this, your organization admins should approve you first as a DailyBot member. Please contact your DailyBot or {{platform}} workspace administrator.

Settings.info: This is a quick overview of your settings. You can manage these settings on my *[Web Application]({{{url}}})*:

TextFormatsPreview.text:
Hi there! The following is a list of the different formats supported by me.
You can also see this *[support article](https://www.dailybot.co)* to know more about how to build responses with these formats.

msteams.1: # Header Level 1: This is a header text
msteams.2: ## Header Level 2: This is a header text
msteams.3: ### Header Level 3: This is a header text

markdown.unordererList:
This is an unorderer list:
- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3
markdown.ordererList:
This is an orderer list:
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3
markdown.codeBlock:
```
This is a code block line 1
This is a code block line 2
```
markdown.image:
There is a text formatted with an image below:
![This text contains a image](https://d2e7nn6oh5ucns.cloudfront.net/images/SEO/ImgSEO_1x.png)

Thanks.1: Oh, don't you even mention it. I'm always happy to help.

Timezone.info: The time information for the typed timezone is:
Timezone.tzSiteInfo: Visit [this site](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones) to get the complete list of timezone values.
Timezone.inputRequired:
A timezone or offset value is required. _Example:`timezone UTC` or `timezone +1`_
You can also type `timezone list` to get the complete list of timezone values.
Timezone.tzInvalid: This is not a valid timezone value.
Timezone.tzResultsFound: I found {{{total}}} results that match with the written timezone:
Timezone.tzResultsFoundMany:
I found {{{total}}} results that match with the written timezone.
These are the first 10 results:
Timezone.offsetInfo: The time information for the typed offset is:
Timezone.offsetInvalid: The offset value should be between -12 and +14.

core.Undefined: Sorry for not understanding. Please type *`help`* for me to help you.

platform_event.MemberJoinedToDirectMessage: Hey! thanks for installing me again.

MemberJoinedToChannel.intro:
*Hi everyone!* I‚Äôm thrilled to be here.
I‚Äôm DailyBot and I can help you automate daily updates, stand-up meetings, check-ins, retrospectives, and track team motivation.

extra.slack: Now you can share reports into this channel.
extra.hangouts: Now you can share reports into this room.
extra.msteams: Now you can receive reports in any channel of this team. All members from this team can now join DailyBot or be invited by an admin.

onboarding.intro:
Hi! Nice to meet you! üëã

I‚Äôm DailyBot and I‚Äôm here to help you automate daily updates, stand-up meetings, check-ins, retrospectives and track mood in your team.
onboarding.info:
Discover some *use cases* for DailyBot:

üìã Daily Standups for Scrum or Agile teams 
üíª Recurring retrospective meetings in Slack
üéØ Periodic follow-ups about team goals or OKRs
üë• Automated 1-1s in Slack
üìÖ Weekly or monthly feedback from team



You can also track your team mood, and enable more types of check-ins with your team.

[Learn more]({{{urlLanding}}}) or visit [our support center]({{{urlSupport}}}) if you need any help.

emptyFollowups.intro: üìã It seems that you don‚Äôt have any pending follow-up tasks for today.
emptyFollowups.info:
Get the most out of DailyBot by automating more check-ins and follow-ups with your team.

[Don‚Äôt miss our product updates](https://www.dailybot.com/blog/release-notes/), [check out our blog](https://www.dailybot.com/blog/), and visit [our support center](https://dailybot.freshdesk.com/support/home) if you need any help.

withFollowups.intro: üìã You have some follow-ups for today, this is the list and status:
withFollowups.info: üç© Tip: try typing *‚Äúhelp‚Äù* in a private message and I‚Äôll show you all the commands that you can use.

FollowupMotivation.question: Psst! Let's do this secretly. ü§ê What's your motivation about work this week? score from 1 to 5 _(5 being high motivation)_.

followup.FollowupDailySnoozed: Ok, your daily has been snoozed for *15 minutes*.
followup.FollowupDailySkipped: Ok, you can start your daily later by typing *`daily`*.

intro.withFollowups: This is the status of your Follow-Ups for today:
intro.emptyFollowups: You don't have any active Follow-Ups to complete today.

answerNotValid.numeric: > _Please type a *valid number* to respond to this question._
answerNotValid.boolean: > _This question expects as answer *one of the options presented*, please try again._
answerNotValid.multiple_choice: > _This question expects as answer *one of the options presented*, please try again._

AddKudo.success: Done! Giving kudos is rewarding! Keep it up.

errors.no_users_found:
A receivers was not found or was duplicated.
Try giving Kudos again, receivers should have an active DailyBot account.
errors.no_valid_users: You can't give kudos to yourself, but I like your intentions and I give kudos to you!

params_validation_error.common: You should specify a team member when giving kudos, try using the command like this:
params_validation_error.extra_channel: *@dailybot* kudos to *@user1* *@user2* _for this and that_ or *@dailybot* *@user1* *@user2* ++ _for this and that_
params_validation_error.extra_direct_message: kudos to *@user1* *@user2* _for this and that_ or *@user1* *@user2* ++ _for this and that_

kudo.KudosStatus: Hi {{user}}, please follow *[this link]({{url}})* to see your kudos status and the leaderboard.
